name: Knockout Fight: Indian Sports
description:
Knockout Fight: Indian Sports is feature with all your real favorite moves as well as combos. Hit the taps on your mobile and swipes to execute the special moves to knockout your opponent to frame your name as sultan king in the arena of dangal in this 3d kabaddi game. Show your real kick in this pro wrestling kabaddi game. Your opponent wrestlers have some special moves and tricks so be careful among the world best wrestling superstar’s champions.
- Battle against heavy weight kabaddi champions
- Authentic actions and realistic Kabaddi moves
- Three modes levels, tournament and Knockout modes with easy,medium,hard modes
